Perineus macronecti Palma & Pilgrim, 1988
;
Price et al. 2003: 212
.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Remarks: Among all the species of lice parasitic on giant petrels,
Perineus macronecti
is the less prevalent (R.L. Palma pers. observation).
